original_text: The king of Israel said to Jehoshaphat, “I will enter the battle in disguise, but you wear your royal robes.” So the king of Israel disguised himself and went into battle.
korean_text: 이스라엘 왕이 여호사밧에게 이르되 나는 변장하고 전쟁터로 들어가려 하노니 당신은 왕복을 입으소서 하고 이스라엘 왕이 변장하고 둘이 전쟁터로 들어가니라

sentences.original_text: The king of Israel said to Jehoshaphat
I will enter the battle in disguise
but you wear your royal robes
So the king of Israel disguised himself
